ComicInfo.Summary:
As a team of expendable but highly trained mercenaries makes its way through the city, threats they never could have imagined hit them at every turn. How can one survive inside of a city run by evil?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Josh Burns | 1 | B | Cover B | David Lorenzo Riviero & Sean Ellery | 2 | C | Cover C | Mike S. Miller & Mohan Sivakami | 3 | D | Cover D | Alfredo Reyes & Wes Hartman | 4 | E | March Cosplay Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Mike DeBalfo (a) & Mike DeBalfo (c) | 5 | Note: The digital edition (3/9/2016) for this issue was released before the print edition.
